title: Help Test My Stream Please :)
body:
Hey Guys,

Joxxeh Here I am starting to get into streaming and would really like it if you could pop over and let me know how its running and looks so far !

Simple Things like 
. Music/ SOund
. FPS
. Smoothness
. Load times 

and anything else you can think of Cheers !

replies.body: This was posted an hour ago, and the stream isn't even running right now lol.
Had to go out for dinner on now !
I'm running into buffering issues, and for the small time i was in there, the music was too loud if your having any intention of talking over it.
Cheers man Ill lower the bit rate hopefully that helps !  and i do but for the time being i and not :)
